Description: When the Demon Jupiter is provoked into hurling his dreaded Red Spot at the magical land of Xanth, it falls to Umlaut, a young man with a mysterious past and unknown future, and his companions to defend the enchanted realm from certain catastrophe, in the twenty-sixth novel in the popular Xanth series.
